channel.title: HTML5 Space Maze (Beta) - for Review
channel.description:
Gethu Game's current HTML5 Game Project titled "HTML5 Space Maze" reached its BETA stage. Since its BETA, beware of bugs :-)
Game Link: [url=http://www.gethugames.in/html5spacemaze/]http://www.gethugames.in/html5spacemaze/[/url]
Game Description: Guide your space craft through myriad of asteroids and reach the home planet as fast as you can before it runs out of gas. As you fly through, your half broken craft emits hazardous gases. Make sure you dont pass through those and fly wisely. Game play progress through various levels with more tighter play time.
Source Code is avail @ [url=https://github.com/saiy2k/HTML5-Space-Maze]https://github.com/saiy2k/HTML5-Space-Maze[/url]
Please play the game and fill out this [url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/viewform?formkey=dG8yUVdiNngyOGZRMkZrZHd1Skx1VlE6MQ]feedback form[/url] to help me improve the game:
[img]http://www.gethugames.in/img/hsmImage.jpg[/img]
Thanks :-)
